LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.label: king hamster
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.description: A giant hamster. Though less intelligent, its increased size and docility led it to be tamed and used as pack animals. It adapts relatively well to hot temperatures.
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.1.label: left hand
LanguageData.RK_KingHamster.tools.2.label: right hand
LanguageData.RK_Leather_KingHamster.label: king hamster fur
LanguageData.RK_Leather_KingHamster.description: The furry pelt of a king hamster. Hamsters retain their cuteness even when they grow in size. Clothing made of this material provides good temperature regulation in hot climates.
LanguageData.RK_Wool_KingHamster.label: king Hamster wool
LanguageData.RK_Wool_KingHamster.description: Soft, light and provides very good insulation. King hamster wool clothes can keep the body warm and ventilated even in extreme conditions.
